div.p: This code system http://linuxforhealth.org/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/match-confidence-level defines the following codes:

tr.td: This record is not likely to be a match. This record should ONLY be matched when another match is used to identify the match or if a human has intervened to specify a match.

description.value: Codes indicating confidence level of matched entities

display.value: This record is not likely to be a match. This record should ONLY be matched when another match is used to identify the match or if a human has intervened to specify a match.
